articles.author: Tara Suter
articles.title: Musk slams Trump megabill: ‘Political suicide for the Republican Party’ - The Hill
articles.description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk again slammed President Trump’s “big, beautiful bill” on Saturday. “Polls show that this bill is political suicide for the Republican Party,” Musk said in a post on the social platform X on Saturday. In another post on the platform,…
